title: Sucrose Wallpaper Info Schema
description: JSON schema for defining wallpaper app information.

Preview.description: Preview image or animation of the wallpaper.

Author.description: Author of the wallpaper (string or null).

License.description: License information for the wallpaper (string or null).

Contact.description: Contact information for the wallpaper (string or null).

Arguments.description: Arguments for the wallpaper (string or null).
